Key Match Events: The Royals evened up their ALDS series against the Yankees 4-2.
On Wednesday, the Royals fell to the Yankees 3-2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Patrick Mahomes attended the Royals-Yankees game despite joking it could cause a 'feud' with his wife Brittany.
Mahomes was seen at the game with his brother Jackson, both wearing Royals jerseys.
The series is tied at one game apiece.
